newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Six killed in Pakistan feud ambush.
newsitem.headline: Six killed in Pakistan feud ambush.

text.p: Tribal gunmen ambushed a passenger pick-up truck in the central province of Punjab on Friday, killing six people and kidnapping four from a rival tribe, police said.

They said six people from Dadesahi tribe were also injured in the gunfire at Rojhan in southwestern Punjab that they blamed on the rival Bugti tribe, which mostly lives in neighbouring Baluchistan province.
The police said they believed the attack was linked to an old feud between the two tribes.
Seven members of Bugti tribe were killed three months ago in an attack blamed on Dadesahis.
